name: Nutella Marshmallow French Toast 🥗
description: Fluffy French toast is paired with gooey marshmallows and creamy Nutella to create this decadent breakfast treat.
instructions: Spread nutella on both slices of white bread.
Cut marshmallows in half and place on one side of the bread.
Whisk together 2 eggs and the double cream.
Dip nutella marshmallow sandwich in mixture.
Fry in butter until both sides are golden brown.
